description: As a Senior Software Developer, I specialize in PHP Laravel development and have led multiple projects, advancing my technical skills across backend development, CMS platforms, and API management. At Tryko Technologies, I served as the backend developer for Tryko App, where I built APIs in Laravel, developed admin modules for driver and customer data, integrated coupon code functionality, and gained expertise in push notifications and Redis server management. For the NEOM project, I led the implementation using Drupal CMS, mastering complex features with hooks, content types, views, and blocks to enhance site structure and organization. I also contributed to ArborXR by designing a personalized backend using the latest Laravel Filament admin panel, implementing customized features to meet specific client needs.

Junior Web Developer with two years of experience at Cypherox Technologies, where I built a diverse range of web projects, including an e-card gifting platform using the Tango Card API with Stripe integration, and several real estate websites featuring property comparisons, wishlist functionality, and brochure downloads. Skilled in Laravel and JavaScript, I developed admin modules for product management, CMS pages, and integrated third-party APIs from Giphy, Mailchimp, and Twilio for enhanced functionality. Starting as an intern, I quickly progressed to live projects, gaining strong backend expertise in PHP and front-end skills in HTML, CSS, and jQuery.

As a Web Developer Intern at Cypherox Technologies, I quickly gained foundational skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, while also beginning backend development with PHP. Starting with small tasks on in-house projects, I advanced rapidly and, within two and a half months, transitioned to working on live projects, where I developed hands-on experience contributing to real-world applications.
